metadata.title: CVE-2022-3821 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An off-by-one Error issue was discovered in Systemd in format_timespan()function of time-util.c. An attacker could supply specific values for timeand accuracy that leads to buffer overrun in format_timespan(), leading toa Denial of Service.

criterions.comment: systemd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
systemd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
